conclusion: Liquid will flow from points A, B, C, and D.
Point A is located at the top left, next to a yellow baffle.
Liquid from point A will encounter the yellow baffle first, directing it towards container E.
Point B is located next to a green baffle.
Liquid from point B will encounter the green baffle, directing it towards container F.
Point C is located next to a blue baffle.
Liquid from point C will encounter the blue baffle, directing it towards container F.
Point D is located next to an orange baffle.
Liquid from point D will encounter the orange baffle, directing it towards container E.
Liquid from points A and D will flow into container E.
Liquid from points B and C will flow into container F.
